gm_player_critreduction_major.name: Critical Failure
gm_player_critreduction_major.description: Players can no longer crit with weapons.

gm_enemy_health_stability_increase.name: Tank
gm_enemy_health_stability_increase.description: Husks have much more health and are harder to slow, stun, and stagger.

gm_enemy_maxhealthincrease_major.name: Husk Heartiness (Major)
gm_enemy_maxhealthincrease_major.description: Husks have largely increased maximum health.

gm_enemy_maxhealthincrease_minor.name: Husk Heartiness (Minor)
gm_enemy_maxhealthincrease_minor.description: Husks have slightly increased maximum health.

gm_player_shieldregenratedecrease_major.name: EMP
gm_player_shieldregenratedecrease_major.description: Player shield regeneration rate is greatly reduced.

difficultyboost02.name: Combat difficulty has been increased!
difficultyboost02.description:
Combat Difficulty: Very Hard
3+ Players recommended

gmid_firedamage.name: Fire
gmid_firedamage.description: Burns targets struck for a short time. More damage to Wood. Resistant to Nature, weak to Water.

gmid_healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
gmid_healpulse.description: Heals all nearby enemies when attacked.

gmid_icedamage.name: Water
gmid_icedamage.description: Slows targets struck for a short time. More damage to Stone. Resistant to Fire, weak to Nature.

gmid_immunetoallbuttraps.name: Trap-Vulnerable
gmid_immunetoallbuttraps.description: Enemy can only be damaged by traps.

gmid_immunetorangeweapons.name: Ranged Weapon Immunity
gmid_immunetorangeweapons.description: Enemies are resistant to range weapons, but vulnerable to melee weapons.

gmid_naturedamage.name: Nature
gmid_naturedamage.description: Drains shield/energy from targets struck. More damage to Metal. Resistant to Water, weak to Fire.

gmid_resisttorocketlauncher.name: Rocket Launcher Resistance
gmid_resisttorocketlauncher.description: Enemies are resistant to rocket launchers.

gmid_trail_slowpool.name: Slowing-Pools
gmid_trail_slowpool.description: Leaves pools on the ground that slow players.

gmid_volcanic.name: Volcanic
gmid_volcanic.description: The ground ruptures under a player, exploding for huge damage.

gmid_vortex.name: Vortex
gmid_vortex.description: Enemy uses a a bolt of energy to pull heroes torwards it.

gm_ug_aoecloud_rangeresistbuff.name: Smoke-Screen
gm_ug_aoecloud_rangeresistbuff.description: Spawns a large smoke screen around itself as it moves, reducing ranged damage against all enemies in the cloud.

gm_ug_aoe_pulse_durationheal.name: Healer
gm_ug_aoe_pulse_durationheal.description: Periodically heals itself and all nearby enemies.

gm_ug_bubbleshield.name: Bubble-Shield
gm_ug_bubbleshield.description: This monster has a protective bubble.

gm_ug_damagepulse.name: Damage-Pulse
gm_ug_damagepulse.description: Damages all nearby players and structures when attacked.

gm_ug_frontshield.name: Shielded
gm_ug_frontshield.description: This monster is protected by a rotating shield.

gm_ug_fury.name: Frenzied
gm_ug_fury.description: This monster is faster and uses abilities more quickly

gm_ug_health_stability_increase.name: Tank
gm_ug_health_stability_increase.description: Enemy has much more health and is harder to slow, stun, and stagger.

gm_ug_ondmgdealt_shieldbreaker.name: Shieldbreaker
gm_ug_ondmgdealt_shieldbreaker.description: Deals increased shield damage, and targets will not regenerate shields for a moderate duration.

gm_ug_ondmgdealt_vampiric.name: Vampiric
gm_ug_ondmgdealt_vampiric.description: Restores a percentage of its health each time it deals damage.

gm_ug_onhitweakenbuildings.name: Wall-Weakening
gm_ug_onhitweakenbuildings.description: Buildings become increasingly vulnerable to damage for a short time after they are attacked by this enemy.

gm_ug_onlowhealth_berserker.name: Berserker
gm_ug_onlowhealth_berserker.description: When enemy is near death it goes berserk, moving and attacking faster and dealing more damage.

gm_ug_ricochet.name: Ricochet
gm_ug_ricochet.description: Enemy reflects a percentage of the ranged damage it suffers.

gm_ug_rustmonster.name: Rusty
gm_ug_rustmonster.description: Attacks made by and against this monster degrade your weapons

gm_ug_spawnacidpool.name: Acid-Pools
gm_ug_spawnacidpool.description: Enemy leaves a trail of damaging pools on the ground.

gm_ug_trail_buildingblocker.name: Building-Blocker
gm_ug_trail_buildingblocker.description: Leaves pools on the ground that block building

gm_ug_trail_buildingdamagepool.name: Rot-Wake
gm_ug_trail_buildingdamagepool.description: Buildings rot in the wake of this monster

elementalzonefireenableitem.name: Fire Storm
elementalzonefireenableitem.description: Changes all elemental enemies to fire.

elementalzonenatureenableitem.name: Lightning Storm
elementalzonenatureenableitem.description: Changes all elemental enemies to nature.

elementalzonewaterenableitem.name: Ice Storm
elementalzonewaterenableitem.description: Changes all elemental enemies to water.

minibossenableprimarymissionitem.name: Epic Mini-Boss
minibossenableprimarymissionitem.description: An Epic Mini-Boss may appear in this area.

gmid_volcanicplayer.name: Volcanic
gmid_volcanicplayer.description: The ground ruptures under a player, exploding for huge damage.

gm_basehusk_ondeath_explode.name: Exploding Deathbomb
gm_basehusk_ondeath_explode.description: Husky Husks, Riot Husks, and Sploders spawn a time bomb when eliminated.

gm_basehusk_ondmgdealt_metalcorrosion.name: Metal Corrosion
gm_basehusk_ondmgdealt_metalcorrosion.description: Basic husk melee attacks cause metal buildings to corrode, periodically damaging them for a time.

gm_bldg_ondeath_buffenemyenvdmg.name: Rolling Destruction
gm_bldg_ondeath_buffenemyenvdmg.description: When a building is destroyed nearby monsters do more damage to buildings.

gm_constructor_blunt_damagebuff.name: If I Had a Hammer
gm_constructor_blunt_damagebuff.description: Constructors do more damage with blunt weapons.

gm_constructor_buildcost_buff.name: Building Constructors
gm_constructor_buildcost_buff.description: Build, Upgrade, and Repair costs reduced for Constructors.

gm_constructor_hardware_damagebuff.name: Hardware Constructors
gm_constructor_hardware_damagebuff.description: Constructors do more damage and crit more often with Hardware weapons.

gm_enemy_applyspeedmods.name: Frenzied
gm_enemy_applyspeedmods.description: Enemies have a movement and attack speed increase.

gm_enemy_ccimmune.name: Unstoppable Husks
gm_enemy_ccimmune.description: Husks are immune to crowd-control.  Stuns, Slows, and Knockbacks will not affect husks. Decoy cannot be activated.

gm_enemy_groundzero.name: Ground Zero
gm_enemy_groundzero.description: Enemies start weaker than normal, but become more and more powerful over time.

gm_enemy_hideonminimap.name: Uncharted Enemies
gm_enemy_hideonminimap.description: Enemies don't show up on the minimap.

gm_enemy_knockbackresist.name: Unstoppable Force
gm_enemy_knockbackresist.description: Knocking enemies back or making them stagger is more difficult.

gm_enemy_level_variance.name: What Level are they!?!
gm_enemy_level_variance.description: All enemy levels vary above/below the base level for the zone. (+10/-10)

gm_enemy_ondeath_applyspeedmods.name: Frenzied Deathburst
gm_enemy_ondeath_applyspeedmods.description: When enemies die, they grant nearby enemies a brief increase in attack as well as both movement and attack speed.

gm_enemy_ondeath_areaheal.name: Healing Deathburst
gm_enemy_ondeath_areaheal.description: When enemies die, they heal nearby enemies for a percentage of their maximum health.

gm_enemy_ondeath_knockback.name: Bass Drop
gm_enemy_ondeath_knockback.description: Everyone nearby is knocked back when an enemy dies.

gm_enemy_ondeath_spawndamagepool.name: Acid Pools
gm_enemy_ondeath_spawndamagepool.description: Enemies have a chance to leave a damaging pool on the ground when they die.

gm_enemy_ondeath_spawnenemyrangeresistpo.name: Smoke Screens
gm_enemy_ondeath_spawnenemyrangeresistpo.description: Enemies have a chance to create a smoke screen when they die, granting enemy damage resistance to ranged attacks.

gm_enemy_ondeath_spawnenemyslowpool.name: Mourning Jog
gm_enemy_ondeath_spawnenemyslowpool.description: When enemies die they can spawn a pool that slows other enemies.

gm_enemy_ondeath_spawnplayerslowpool.name: Slowing Pools
gm_enemy_ondeath_spawnplayerslowpool.description: Enemies have a chance to leave a slowing pool on the ground when they die.

gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_knockback.name: They Must Work Out!
gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_knockback.description: Enemy melee attacks knock heroes back

gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_lifeleech.name: Life Leech Attacks
gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_lifeleech.description: Enemies restore health each time they deal damage.

gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_reducedmgfoe.name: Slap-fest
gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_reducedmgfoe.description: Players deal less damage after being struck by enemies

gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_slowdownfoe.name: Slowing Attacks
gm_enemy_ondmgdealt_slowdownfoe.description: Whenever a player is struck by a melee attack, they move more slowly for a short time.

gm_enemy_ondmgreceived_dmgbuff.name: Make Me Angry
gm_enemy_ondmgreceived_dmgbuff.description: Each time the monster is attacked it becomes more powerful.

gm_enemy_ondmgreceived_speedbuff.name: Quickened
gm_enemy_ondmgreceived_speedbuff.description: Enemies gain movement speed for a time after taking damage from the player.

gm_enemy_onevndmgdealt_lifeleech.name: Termites
gm_enemy_onevndmgdealt_lifeleech.description: Enemies heal by a percentage of all damage dealt to buildings.

gm_enemy_onhitweakenbuildings.name: Wall Weakening
gm_enemy_onhitweakenbuildings.description: Buildings become increasingly vulnerable to damage for a short time after they are attacked.

gm_enemy_onlowhealth_enrage.name: Enraged
gm_enemy_onlowhealth_enrage.description: When enemies are near death they become enraged, dealing more damage.

gm_enemy_ricochet.name: Ricochet
gm_enemy_ricochet.description: Enemies reflect a percentage of the ranged damage they suffer.

gm_enemy_ricochet_major.name: Ricochet (Major)
gm_enemy_ricochet_major.description: Enemies reflect a percentage of the ranged damage they suffer.

gm_enemy_thorns.name: Thorny
gm_enemy_thorns.description: Any melee hits to monsters causes some damage to the attacker.

gm_enemy_weaponandabilityresist.name: Husk Hardiness
gm_enemy_weaponandabilityresist.description: Enemies take reduced damage from weapons and player abilities.

gm_itemsharingenabled.name: Item Sharing Enabled
gm_itemsharingenabled.description: Share items with teammates in this mode.

gm_ninja_abilityrate_buff.name: Focused Ninjas
gm_ninja_abilityrate_buff.description: Ninja ability cool downs and energy costs are reduced.

gm_ninja_jumpheight_buff.name: Leaping Ninjas
gm_ninja_jumpheight_buff.description: Mantis Leap now deals AoE damage when landing.

gm_ninja_sword_damagebuff.name: Sword Ninjas
gm_ninja_sword_damagebuff.description: Ninjas do more damage and crit more often with swords.

gm_outlander_harvesterattack_damagebuff.name: Reaping Time
gm_outlander_harvesterattack_damagebuff.description: Outlander attacks with the harvester tool do more damage to the environment.

gm_outlander_harvesterenv_damagebuff.name: Heavy Work
gm_outlander_harvesterenv_damagebuff.description: Outlander attacks with the harvester tool do more damage.

gm_player_axesscythesdamage_buff.name: Powerful Axes and Scythes
gm_player_axesscythesdamage_buff.description: Axe and Scythe weapons do more damage.

gm_player_bluntdamage_buff.name: Powerful Clubs and Hardware
gm_player_bluntdamage_buff.description: Club and Hardware weapons do more damage.

gm_player_buildcost_buff.name: Building Benefit
gm_player_buildcost_buff.description: Build, Upgrade, and Repair costs reduced.

gm_player_disablerepair.name: No Repairs
gm_player_disablerepair.description: Heroes can't repair buildings for one wave.

gm_player_energy_damagebuff.name: Powerful Energy Attacks
gm_player_energy_damagebuff.description: Player energy attacks do more damage.

gm_player_meleedamage_buff.name: Haymakers
gm_player_meleedamage_buff.description: Player melee attacks do greatly increased damage

gm_player_meleeknockback_buff.name: Knockback Melee Attacks
gm_player_meleeknockback_buff.description: Player melee attacks do increased knockback.

gm_player_ondmgdealt_lifeleech.name: Melee Life Leech
gm_player_ondmgdealt_lifeleech.description: Heroes heal by a percentage of the melee damage they deal.

gm_player_ondmgdealt_taunt.name: Taunting
gm_player_ondmgdealt_taunt.description: Enemies move faster but are more vulnerable to damage when attacked.

gm_player_ondmgreceived_dmgshare.name: Shared Hero Damage
gm_player_ondmgreceived_dmgshare.description: Whenever a player loses health, allies suffer damage equal to a percentage of that amount.

gm_player_onmeleedmgdealt_slowdownfoe.name: Tase
gm_player_onmeleedmgdealt_slowdownfoe.description: Enemies move more slowly after being struck by melee attacks.

gm_player_onrepair_takedamage.name: Blood, Sweat, and Tears
gm_player_onrepair_takedamage.description: Heroes take damage when they repair buildings

gm_player_onshielddestroyed_aoe.name: Concussive Shieldbreak
gm_player_onshielddestroyed_aoe.description: When a player's shield is destroyed, nearby enemies take damage. Smaller enemies are likely to be knocked back.

gm_player_pistol_minibossdamagebuff.name: Powerful Pistols Versus Bosses
gm_player_pistol_minibossdamagebuff.description: Pistols do more damage versus bosses.

gm_player_rangedmgdealt_debuffs_playerac.name: Guilty Gun
gm_player_rangedmgdealt_debuffs_playerac.description: Ranged accuracy is decreased for a short time after hitting a target.

gm_player_ranged_damagereload_buff.name: Quickshot
gm_player_ranged_damagereload_buff.description: Ranged weapons reload faster and do more damage.

gm_player_reflect.name: Reflective
gm_player_reflect.description: Player reflects a portion of melee damage back on the attacker.

gm_player_shieldbuff.name: Shields Up!
gm_player_shieldbuff.description: Hero shields are increased and regenerate at a faster rate

gm_player_slowbuildtime.name: Paid by the Hour
gm_player_slowbuildtime.description: Buildings take longer to construct and repair.

gm_player_spearsworddamage_buff.name: Powerful Swords and Spears
gm_player_spearsworddamage_buff.description: Spear and Sword weapons do more damage.

gm_soldier_abilityrate_buff.name: Well Drilled Soldiers
gm_soldier_abilityrate_buff.description: Soldier ability cool downs and energy costs are reduced.

gm_soldier_assaultrifle_buff.name: Headshot Soldiers
gm_soldier_assaultrifle_buff.description: Soldiers do more damage with Assault Rifles when scoring head shots.

gm_soldier_sprint_unlimited.name: Mandatory PT
gm_soldier_sprint_unlimited.description: Soldiers don't use energy while sprinting

gm_trap_buff.name: Powerful Traps
gm_trap_buff.description: Traps hit harder, fire more often, and last longer.

gm_trap_buff_major.name: Supreme Traps
gm_trap_buff_major.description: Traps deal heavy damage, fire frequently, and last much longer.

gm_phoenix_acidrain.name: Acid Rain
gm_phoenix_acidrain.description: Stay under cover! Heroes suffer damage over time when not under a roof.

gm_phoenix_closequarters.name: Short Range
gm_phoenix_closequarters.description: Enemies close to a player or defender suffer more damage; those far away suffer less. All enemies have a chance to a drop healing pickup when eliminated.

gm_phoenix_escalation.name: Escalation
gm_phoenix_escalation.description:
Maintain an elimination streak to increase your power! Every
30 eliminations your team will trigger an elemental burst
that hits nearby enemies and a 10% damage boost to weapons and ability damage, building up to a maximum of 100% extra damage. The streak will be lost if you go 20 seconds without an elimination.

gm_phoenix_ragemeter.name: Rage
gm_phoenix_ragemeter.description: No Energy regeneration - instead damaging enemies with weapons adds Energy. Abilities have improved cooldowns and effectiveness.

gm_phoenix_superconstructor.name: Super Constructor
gm_phoenix_superconstructor.description: Building costs are reduced by 66%. Melee Impact damage dealt is increased, and triggering Kinetic Overload reduces active cooldowns by 4 seconds. Reduced weapon damage.

gm_phoenix_superheroic.name: Super Soldier
gm_phoenix_superheroic.description: Headshot damage gets a x2 bonus. Ranged weapon eliminations reduce active cooldowns by 4 seconds. If Frag Grenade is equipped, every 6 ranged eliminations grant a grenade. Reduced melee weapon and trap damage.

gm_phoenix_superhusks_huskmods.name: Bouncy Husks
gm_phoenix_superhusks_huskmods.description: Normal and Husky Husks have increased health. All husks get knocked back further and easier, and player weapons get bonus knock back.

gm_phoenix_superhusks_melee.name: [ph]Husk Knockback Vulnerability
gm_phoenix_superhusks_melee.description: [ph]Husks are easier to knock back, and when a player knocks one back they fly farther.

gm_phoenix_superhusks_playerbenefits.name: Super Treasure
gm_phoenix_superhusks_playerbenefits.description: Great monsters mean great rewards! Players periodically spawn a chest full of valuable items when eliminating enemies. Tougher enemies drop chests more frequently.

gm_phoenix_superhusks_ranged.name: Super Ranged Monsters
gm_phoenix_superhusks_ranged.description: [ph]Ranged Husks have 30% less health, and deal reduced damage.

gm_phoenix_superhusks_tank.name: [ph]Super Tough Monsters
gm_phoenix_superhusks_tank.description: [ph]Normal and Husky Husks, and Mist Monsters have increased health and move more slowly.

gm_phoenix_superninja.name: Super Ninja
gm_phoenix_superninja.description: Ability eliminations increase melee damage and attack speed by 50% for 10 seconds. Melee weapon eliminations reduce active cooldowns by 2 seconds. Shadowstance's benefits are doubled. Reduced ranged weapon and trap damage.

gm_phoenix_superoutlander.name: Super Outlander
gm_phoenix_superoutlander.description: Anti-Material Charge costs 0 Energy. They gain a fragment every 50 seconds. Passive 30% damage buff to active abilities. Reduced weapon and trap damage.

gm_player_metalbuildcostincrease_major.name: Expensive Metal
gm_player_metalbuildcostincrease_major.description: Metal structures cost significantly more to build.

gm_player_stonebuildcostincrease_major.name: Expensive Stone
gm_player_stonebuildcostincrease_major.description: Stone structures cost significantly more to build.

gm_player_woodbuildcostincrease_major.name: Resource Demand: Wood (Major)
gm_player_woodbuildcostincrease_major.description: Wood structures cost significantly more to build and repair.
